data.title: American Vacuum Society 2024
data.meta_description: The AVS 72nd International Symposium and Exhibition fosters a multidisciplinary environment that cuts across traditional boundaries between materials, interfaces, and processing, featuring a plenary lecture; parallel topical sessions from AVS technical divisions, technology groups, and focus topics;poster sessions and short courses. For additional information, please visit: www.avs.org or 212-248-0200

The AVS 72nd International Symposium and Exhibition fosters a multidisciplinary environment that cuts across traditional boundaries between materials, interfaces, and processing, featuring a plenary lecture; parallel topical sessions from AVS technical divisions, technology groups, and focus topics;poster sessions and short courses. For additional information, please visit: www.avs.org or 212-248-0200

Tampa Convention Center
